header.rec_loc: At the home of speakers 2 and 3 in Winchester, Hampshire
header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: The taping process. Choir and singing. TV personalities. TV programmes. Cats and dogs. Children. Books for children. Decorating. Inventions. Smokers. Colleagues at work. Language analysis. Radio 4 News. Passport control. Pension contributions. Retirement plans. Moving to Tower Hamlets. Parents. Working in Woolworths. Childhood routines. Linked-In. Job applications.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, anecdote telling
